name: ResilienceMinutewithZaheenNanji
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
In this new economy and digital world, change is inevitable. With change comes challenges, obstacles, stress and overwhelm. Now more than ever, you require a different set of strategies and skills to cope and manage, which is why building your resilience is important, so it becomes your reflex in these changing times.

This skill, hosted by Zaheen Nanji, shares content-rich, entertaining, hard-hitting and memorable ideas focusing on HR, health professionals, educators and leaders.

Everyday, Zaheen brings her experience as a TEDx speaker and resilience champion to show you how to make resilience your first reflex!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
